description:
The developers behind the iconic Halo franchise have announced a shift in their approach to game development. 343 Industries, now rebranded as Halo Studios, will be abandoning their proprietary Slipspace Engine in favour of Unreal Engine 5 for all future Halo projects. This revelation came during the 2024 Halo World Championship, where fans were treated... Read more »

The post Halo developers shelve own game development engine for Unreal appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Halo developers shelve own game development engine for Unreal
